mjaksic.Hive_Redis_To_Spark_To_Hive

Class HiveJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • mjaksic.Hive_Redis_To_Spark_To_Hive.HiveJDBC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class HiveJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Connects to a Hive database using JDBC. An experimental class.
